overview: Easter is just around the corner and Hops the Easter Bunny is on a mission to solve the greatest Easter mystery ever: what came first, the chicken or the egg? As Hops and her best friend Lil' Bit investigate they realize they almost missed Miss Koala's birthday. Will Hopz and Lil' Bit find a gift in time for Miss Koala's birthday party? Join the sleuthing fun with Hopz And The Easter Mystery.
title: Hopz and the Easter Mystery
